Name: ANIME - World War II
About the game: ANIME â€” World War II In this third-person WWII-themed shooter H.E.N.T.A.I. battalion is on a huge mission of clearing out the fallen city from enemies. There are a couple of winning strategies you might want to choose depending on the type of weapon in your hands. Choose wisely: there is no map of what's left of the city, and there is little to no information about how much enemies left. STORY The year 1941 is the year of creation of H.E.N.T.A.I. battalion.The city fell quickly after the nazi advent. The nation is desperate and there is no hope left. This is a dangerous path these Anime Girls took as our saviors.. So let's be wary, thought, enemies are now smarter then ever and there is no sense of begging them.. Join the H.E.N.T.A.I. battalion of the best Anime Girls out there and win this city back to our nation! KEY FEATURES 3rd person shooter in the World War II setting A vide variety of weapons to choose from User-friendly and intuitive combat controls Character in-depth customization possibility Heavily animated & with special effects
